attributes.action: Unban Tyler, the Creator from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: "However, government papers given to Tyler specifically cite lyrics from VCR, Blow, Sarah, Tron Cat and French, and explain that he was rejected under the terms of Home Office policy on “behaviours unacceptable in the UK” - The Guardian 2015.
attributes.background: Tyler, the Creator was banned back in 2015 for using provacative lyrics, written in 2009. Banned for freedom of speech. We have to lift this ban. Failing that getting a reasonable explanation as to why lyrics from when a man was 17. When a human is still maturing that the UK has decided to ban.
